original_solution_mapping.L1: If the first snail traveled the distance in 20 minutes, then the second snail, traveling at twice the rate of speed, would take 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 minutes to complete the race.
original_solution_mapping.L2: If the third snail raced at five times the speed of the second snail, then it would take the third snail 10/5=<<10/5=2>>2 minutes to race all the way up the sidewalk.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3875.
    Returns: the time it took for the third snail to race all the way up the sidewalk.
    """
    # L1
    first_snail_time = 20 # took the first snail 20 minutes
    second_snail_speed_multiplier = 2 # twice the speed of the first snail
    second_snail_time = first_snail_time / second_snail_speed_multiplier

    # L2
    third_snail_speed_multiplier = 5 # five times the rate of speed as the second snail
    third_snail_time = second_snail_time / third_snail_speed_multiplier

    # FA
    answer = third_snail_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If the first snail traveled the distance in {first_snail_time} minutes, then the second snail, traveling at twice the rate of speed, would take {first_snail_time}/{second_snail_speed_multiplier}=<<{first_snail_time}/{second_snail_speed_multiplier}={second_snail_time}>>{second_snail_time} minutes to complete the race.

If the third snail raced at five times the speed of the second snail, then it would take the third snail {second_snail_time}/{third_snail_speed_multiplier}=<<{second_snail_time}/{third_snail_speed_multiplier}={third_snail_time}>>{third_snail_time} minutes to race all the way up the sidewalk.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: If the first snail traveled the distance in 20 minutes, then the second snail, traveling at twice the rate of speed, would take 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 minutes to complete the race.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: If the third snail raced at five times the speed of the second snail, then it would take the third snail 10/5=<<10/5=5>>5 minutes to race all the way up the sidewalk.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '-' instead.
